medium: Offset lithograph, key plate in black
title: Apex Oculus
marks:
Signed, dated, numbered, chop mark LR: [Cumming 1986]
LC: [STATE PROOF 1/2]
description: Symmetrical composition featuring a large central object that simulates the shape of a light bulb; in its center, a ray-like projection extends from its base to its top; the words \"OCULUS FOCUS\" inscribed LC (within the image)
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid
